page.title: 19POLITICS
page.content: This area comes under the Aldershot Parliamentary constituence and is locally administered by Hart District Council and Yateley Town Council. The rateable value is about Â£2 million and raises a Hampshire rate of173.4p and a local rate of 7.6p. There is a library, and mobile library, police and fire stations, and three community halls. Bus services are operated by Thames Valley which includes the London Link service, connecting Yateley with Heathrow Airport and the capital. There are also two private coach operators in the area. Rail services are available from Fleet, Farnborough and Aldershot to London and the West, and from Sandhurst and Blackwater for the Reading-Guildford and Tunbridge Line.
